title: Getting court
creator_credit: Mozo Films, Debra Annear and David Tiley
brief_description: Tony is involved in car crash and required to appear in court, charged with careless driving. This program explains what is involved in the process and includes helpful advice from a magistrate on what to expect and how to prepare for a court appearance.
creator_credit_for_label: Mozo Films, Debra Annear and David Tiley
